attributes.action: To never invoke article 50 now or in future.
attributes.additional_details:
We live in a wonderful country in a wonderful part of the world we call Europe. As MPs you have the power to show maturity and cross party unity to ensure its stays a wonderful country.You have the power to show our friends in the world we put tolerance and hope at the centre of our lives.
The majority of our people ,who do not shout out loud, want to be heard now. They are the fabric of our tolerant society and you can trust them to help you do the right thing for our children.
attributes.background: We made a mistake and voted to leave. Doctors sometimes act against a patients wishes to save their life and our MPs must act now to save our future. You are elected to make the life and death decisions for our country and we must show our partners in Europe and the world we learn from our mistakes.
